mapper.select: select type_code typeCode, type_name typeName from t_sys_good_type where is_delete = 0 and parent_code = 0 order by type_code

select t.type_code, t.type_name, g.good_code, g.good_name, g.sell_price, g.pictureUrl from t_sys_good_type as t left join t_sys_goods as g on t.parent_code = g.level_one_code and t.type_code = g.level_two_code where parent_code = #{typeCode} and t.is_delete = 0 and g.is_delete = 0 and g.good_state = 1 order by type_code

select good_code, good_name, good_introduce, ( select s.store_name from t_sys_store as s left join t_sys_user as u on s.invite_code = u.invite_code and u.role = 4 and u.is_delete = 0 where s.is_delete = 0 and u.user_code = #{createUser} ) storeName, sell_price, ( select format(sum(assess_rank)/count(assess_rank), 1) from t_sys_assess where good_code = #{goodCode} group by good_code ) goodRank, pictureUrl from t_sys_goods where is_delete = 0 and good_code = #{goodCode} order by good_code
mapper.update: update t_sys_goods set browse_volume = browse_volume + 1, update_user = #{createUser}, update_time = now(), version = version + 1 where good_code = #{goodCode} and is_delete = 0
mapper.insert:
insert into t_sys_assess (assess_code, assess_user, assess_rank, assess_content, assess_time, good_code, is_delete, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, version) values
( #{item.assessCode}, #{item.createUser}, #{item.assessRank}, #{item.assessContent}, now(), #{item.goodCode}, 0, #{item.createUser}, now(), #{item.createUser}, now(), 0 )
mapper.update: update t_sys_order set order_state = 8 where order_code = #{orderCode} and is_delete = 0
